content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "wandering_trader_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 15, "index": 18}, {"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 23, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 7, "index": 30}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 63, "index": 41}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 47, "index": 42}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 43}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 58, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a golden shovel, I first need to craft gold ingots. I have 1 nether gold ore, which can be smelted into a gold ingot. Therefore I will smelt the nether gold ore at slot 32 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 32 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 4 with quantity 1
